Defender - Companion (Common)troy_main_hero_defender_quick_set

1

The War-god's Call

The War-god's Call

Face me now, or fearsome Ares shall visit his fury upon you!

"The War-god's Call" ability
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

The War-god's Call

120
Hero ability
Duration:45 seconds
Target:

Enemy

Affects enemies in range

30m

Effect range:1m
Effects:

Forces the target to attack the taunter

The Way of Hermes

The Way of Hermes (Speed)

Travelling seemingly without moving, without fatigue or loss of time: that is the Messenger's way.

+20% to battle speed of Hero
-5 to armour of Hero
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Stalwart

Stalwart (Line of Sight & Resistance)

Ever-loyal and committed, this one is sometimes down, on occasion out, but it's hardest to remove them from the fight altogether.

Increases the line of sight of Hero's army
+15% to critical failure chance of enemy agent actions against this Hero
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Stalwart (Upkeep)

Ever-loyal and committed, this one is sometimes down, on occasion out, but it's hardest to remove them from the fight altogether.

-15% to upkeep cost of all Heroes factionwide
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Stalwart

Ever-loyal and committed, this one is sometimes down, on occasion out, but it's hardest to remove them from the fight altogether.

-2 to turns Hero spends wounded
-25% to success chance of enemy agent actions against this Hero
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Disciplinarian

-15% to attrition in Hero's army

+7% to casualty replenishment when raiding

Show them, in certain terms, the ignominy and shame of the defeated, and the inexorable right of the victorious.

Raiding no longer incurs movement penalties

Take only what you need, but do not leave what's left for the foe when you can destroy it instead; denial of victory is the same as defeat.

+25% to income from sacking
Causes greater damage to buildings when sacking
+15 to influence after razing a settlement for 5 turns (when character is in a non-razed region)
